Large Structured Coated Canvas Tote Bag

Large Structured Coated Canvas Tote Bag

The tote that carries your laptop, keeps your bottle upright, holds its shape and helps you hold it together.

Hardware: Light 18k Gold
REGISTER INTEREST
  • 16-inch laptop sleeve
  • Adjustable crossbody strap
  • 6 pockets + bottle holder
THE RUNDOWN

Meet the Bon Vivant Tote—made for big days and built with mess-friendly coated canvas to handle real-life chaos—stylishly. It fits a 16” laptop in a padded sleeve, your Stanley in a bottle holder, and your daily extras in cleverly designed compartments. Now with a 150cm adjustable crossbody strap, zipped closure, suitcase strap, key clip and a coffee-coloured lining that makes finding things easy. Finished with metal feet to help protect the base—because this tote’s designed to keep up, beautifully. The largest of our tote 3 sizes.

WHAT YOU GET
  • Protective device storage padded 16-inch laptop sleeve
  • Life-resistant exterior with water-resistant, wipeable coated canvas
  • No dark caves of bag doom with coffee-coloured, water-resistant lining
  • Comfy carrying with adjustable, size-inclusive crossbody strap + flat-top handles
  • Effortless organisation with 6 pockets
    • Back phone slip pocket
    • 2 x internal zip pockets 
    • 3 x internal open pockets
  • Easy travelling with luggage strap across back
  • Keys that never get lost with easy-spot pink key clip
  • Space for up to A3 items in main compartment
  • Droop prevention with reinforced base
  • Handy hydration with spill-proof bottle holder (13cm x 11cm + 17cm height - pictured Montii 1L bottle 10.5cm, Yeti + Frank Green fits
  • Quality guarantee with 12 month manufacturer's warranty
THE SPECS
  • Size: 34 cm x 42 cm x 16 cm 
  • Fits: Up to 38cm wide laptop in sleeve (standard laptop models are determined by the diagonal screen size - your model may have additional framing so we recommend measuring to ensure it fits) 
  • Material:TPU-coated cotton canvas
  • Lining: Water-resistant nylon
  • Strap drop: 24cm
  • Drink bottle holder: 13cm wall with curve out to 11cm
  • Hardware: Light gold or gunmetal options
  • Weight capacity: 5kg


COATED CANVAS: Our TPU-coated canvas does feel a little different to straight cotton, but that's the beauty of it - instead of it attracting dirt, you can wipe it away so your bag stays looking better for a lot longer. It feels a little more rigid with this coating and may have a slight sheen to it.

Please note there may be up to 1cm difference in measurements depending on the hand craftsmanship of each bag.

CARE

Cotton canvas is a durable material - the TPU coating makes the external of the bag resistant to more dirt and water - please keep in mind it is not completely stain proof, be sure to clean spills etc ASAP. To clean, wipe gently with a baby wipe or mild soap - vigorous rubbing may cause abrasion/damage to the coating. Store out of direct sunlight, avoid abrasive surfaces. We recommend using our Collonil waterproofer to help care for your items. Clean gently with soft, damp cloth or spot clean with care, avoiding hardware. Rain exposure should still be avoided. Avoid rubbing this material against colour-contrasting materials as some dyes may stain irreparably, protect it from ongoing UV exposure, heat, liquids and greasy substances where possible. 

QUALITY GUARANTEE—12 MONTH WARRANTY

We started as a handmade brand and now produce on a larger scale—but our products are still thoughtfully crafted, with every design tested to meet our standards.

While rare, manufacturing faults can happen. If something’s not right, we’ll work with you to get it sorted.

Your purchase is covered by a 12-month warranty for genuine manufacturing faults.

CURRENT SHIPPING TIMES

We understand it's hard waiting for an online order! We are in the midst of an influx of orders so our warehouse has roped in extra buddies and working overtime to get orders despatched as humanly possible. We truly appreciate your patience and are doing everything we can to process them as speedily as possible - currently a 3-5 business day despatch time. THANK YOU!

We plan ahead, we pack fast, and we appreciate your patience while we get the good stuff out to you. This estimate doesn’t include Australia Post delivery time. Express shipping speeds up your delivery once it’s left us—not the time it takes to pack. Got a pre-order? Your full order ships once it’s all in stock and the anticipated date is available on the item listing.

Want a more specific despatch estimate? Feel free to email—we can give you a clearer timeframe based on when you ordered.

    Sturdy carry all work bag

    Finally took the leap and bought this large version to replace the small version of this bag. Love Love love it. This bag now replaces 3 bags I used to carry with me to work. I now fit laptop, lunch box, umbrella and all the usual things I bring with me everywhere eg wallet, mobile etc...I even managed to slip in a pair of spare shoes to bring to work for rainy days when I need to change out of wet shoes. This bag stays upright throughout my bus trip when I had to place it on the floor when it's crowded. The 2 handles are super strong n stays slightly tilted/upright and have helped me many times when I had to quickly bend down a little (not all the way down for other bags as the straps on those flops all the way down the sides of the bag) to quickly grab my bag to zip out if the way of alighting passengers. The bag holds its shape so well that i don't feel like I'm being dragged down one side when it's packed to the brim.
